name: 拉尔夫·齐尔曼
name_full: 拉尔夫·齐尔曼 Ralf Zillmann
introduction: Ralf Zillmann is an actor from Germany, born in Hildesheim in Lower Saxony. He got his first experiences in acting during his school time in the theatre and the musical group of his school. He later moved to Potsdam, Brandenburg, to visit the university and further his acting career. He appeared in numerous independent projects, student movies and music-clips, also in several mainstream productions like TERRA X.
